column2:
"About Matoi being gone...
And about what came before."
"...Hey, senpai. What's it like, fighting for someone else?"
"When I was talking to Matoi before, it came out of her mouth so easily. \"For everyone's sake\", she said."

"I didn't understand it back then.
...In fact, I still don't get it."
"...But looking at your face, I've realised something."
"I'm angry. I'm furious at her for leaving us like this."
"Even though I barely know her, I still feel like I have to say something. I can't imagine how you must be feeling."
"So you find her, senpai, and you tell her. Get mad at Matoi for the both of us."
"Don't let her throw her life away like this. I won't accept that this is how it ends..."

"This can't be how it ends.
...It can't be."
